<span class="citation" data-cites="babel/helper-validator-option">@babel/helper-validator-option</span>
=======================================================================================================

> Validate plugin/preset options

See our website <span class="citation" data-cites="babel/helper-validator-option">\[@babel/helper-validator-option\]</span>(https://babeljs.io/docs/en/babel-helper-validator-option) for more information.

Install
-------

Using npm:

    npm install --save-dev @babel/helper-validator-option

or using yarn:

    yarn add @babel/helper-validator-option --dev
